channel.title: Be aware!
channel.description:
Okay, I've never seen this before, but someone gave me an account because they said they lost all their money dicing. So, I was like okay, whatever, thanks. But, I was smart and didn't give the new account my stuff. So, just so you guys know, in-case you run into someone saying they lost their money dicing or something along the lines and are giving the account away, don't trust them. They normally target lower levels so that they're excited and place all of their items on the account. Then they just recover it before you could have the recoveries set. So don't fall for this!
NOTE: I am NOT saying that anyone should EVER try to scam someone. I am just trying to help the mopar community be aware.

item.title: Be aware!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

rip4d:

I think people should be more aware of the Storm of Armadyl spell glitch that was happening.

True, but, that was already patched.

Read full topic

item.title: Be aware!
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

What I do when people give away accounts is a gold farm the site out of them on nats doing it for 100+ hours strait on my vps then transfer allt he runes to a level 3 free player. Once I log out of it it gets auto banned from that non stop botting and I walk away with 20-30m in nature runes. (:

XD Damn that’s a great idea.

Read full topic
